alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 3:15PM CDT until July 08 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Beaver River at Beaver affecting Beaver County. For the Beaver River...including Beaver...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Beaver River at Beaver. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farm and ranch land occurs. No significant damage expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.2 feet this evening. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM CDT.
